system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Spears)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.5F79UHqSJAuVoovG]{Spear Martial Arts}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.vmQHM3FYHt8sRaAD]{Spear Specialist}

Benefits

When wielding a halberd, long spear, rifle bayonet, or short spear, the Critical Threat range is 12-18 and any natural roll of a 15-18 is an automatic hit. Also, when wielding the chosen weapon, every square that the chosen weapon can attack has a tripled movement Combat Point cost for any hostile creatures. This effect does not stack

Special

The Combat Point cost increase replaces any original effect.

Normal

16-18 are automatic hits without this feat.
system.summary: 12-18 crit, 15-18 autohit, triple movement cost within threatened squares
